item.title: CVE-2021-27653|2024-08-03T21:26:10.698Z -- pega%20systems -- pega%20infinity
item.description: Misconfiguration of the Pega Chat Access Group portal in Pega platform 7.4.0 - 8.5.x could lead to unintended data exposure.
